description: Fired after the game finishes processing an AI entity's turn, including any action taken.

payloadSchema.title: Core: AI Turn Processing Ended Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:ai_turn_processing_ended' event.

entityId.description: The unique ID of the AI entity whose turn processing has ended.

actionResult.description: The result returned by the CommandProcessor after attempting the AI's action, or null if processing failed before an action result was obtained.
